content:
本件保存七年
02-62-1573
May 18, 2
Mr. W. K. Ku Chief Engineer Shihmen Development Commission
Subject: Excess Equipment Pro.ject No. 84-99-471
Dear Mr. Ku:
Reference is made to your letter SOC-5111 dated May 12, 1962.
In reply, we wish to advise that the 10-ton Roller referred to in your letter has already been allocated to SDC per CUSA allocation letter No. 2231 dated May 1, 1962 with copy sent to SDC. Please contact BES accordingly.
Very truly yours, Original signed by K. T. Li K. T. Li Secretary General
cc: Mr. J. B. Carter, US AID/C BES 2D CS/psh
E-16.13.2
(2) 211 D Academia Historica
54. 3. 100×200
393
